Sorry for this, but it helps save our maintainers' time so that more developers get helped.
Feel free to create another issue using the issue template.

If you think you have already made your point clear without the template, or your problem cannot be covered by it, you may re-open this issue again.

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

Seems to be due to day light savings - possibly related to this PR  https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/pull/12081

Update:

I tried the above PR change and it did not work as I expected.

I have since found this issue from last year that is working fine so far: https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/issues/10430
Ok Thanks for the support.

This issue is labeled with `priority: high`, which means it's a frequently asked problem and we will fix it ASAP.
@mikeyshing88 Thanks for reporting. We will see to it and find if we can make a PR based on #10430 's solution. You are welcomed to make a PR if you wish.
@kibbon Please check your demo and make sure it works. You may try jsfiddle if there is CORS problem.
结果上看没有问题，可能是理解有误

嗯，从线来看是这样的，我也参考了其他的，比如阿里的G2，也是这样的。  但是看Hight CHart漏斗图，如果没有值，为0的话，就不显示面积。直接一根线在那
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10398315/74701453-b1596880-5241-11ea-86bd-d97f1edfa334.png)

请问后续有考虑，1 这样模式么，还有2可以自己控制改变漏斗脖子大小
通过 neckWith 和 neckneckHeight 可以指定漏斗脖子的宽度和高度，其值为百分数，表示占总宽度或总高度百分比
Set [layout](https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#series-graph.layout) to be `'none'` and pass `x` and `y` in [data](https://echarts.apache.org/zh/option.html#series-graph.data.x).
Please save your code online.
@Serious-ChrisLopez Please provide a demo for the issue either with https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/ or https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html.
我觉得是合理的，但是这个需求比较小众。如果确实有这方面需求，比较快速的解决方法是尝试调试代码，然后给我们提 PR~
好的，谢谢。我先看看代码怎么弄。
I have saved the demo here: https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=x6WGc3uDy&v=2

https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xAWeB4ROg&v=4
updated

I'm facing the same behavior. What is the trick to update the series data to get to the true sliding graph?

I have located the problem at the file barPolar.js,  it seems that the value of baseCoord is incorrect. based on the code, baseCoord = valueAxis.getExtent()[0]; Howerver I can't find out the correct  variable to replace it. If anyone solves the problem, please @ me and give me a chance to learn, TX!

> 朋友你好，我之前debug过，那个代码是有精度问题。而且经纬度变量在有个地方写反了，不知你发现了没。在网格太多的情况下，性能也是个问题。 另外，如果你想实现这种效果，我倒是找到一个更好的方法，很乐意与你分享。 logindeny@163.com 发件人： Future.hui 发送时间： 2017-11-20 20:29 收件人： ecomfe/echarts 抄送： hello; Mention 主题： Re: [ecomfe/echarts] Binning on Map坐标映射不正确 (#6965) @eniac27427 然而并不是，这个差距远远比所谓的精度差很多 — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

你好，我也遇到了这个问题。而且，我发现，在这个 demo 中，我打上自己数据集中的坐标，发现整个区域有较大的偏移，请问你是有对应的解决办法吗？或者有其它更好的解决方案来做 binning map 吗？谢谢

Duplicated of #12163.
Thanks. This seems to be a bug.
This issue is labeled with `priority: high`, which means it's a frequently asked problem and we will fix it ASAP.
@JaspervanRiet Please provide a demo for the issue either with https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/ or https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html.
Sorry, I'm afraid it's not possible.
@klausb Please provide a demo for the issue either with https://jsfiddle.net/ovilia/n6xc4df3/ or https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html.
不该出现的点具体是指？另外建议简化一下例子，把初始数据的 3000 条改为最少能复现问题的大小，不然 3000 很难定位的。
I don't have a windows to test right now. Is this effect on Mac the expected result?

Pie charts don't support brush operation. See https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#brush .
What's the user scenario for this?
You need to set `roam: true` in `geo`.

Yes, on the Mac os it works fine. But on Win10 it works like this:
![screenshot](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2372259/75018764-bc5e0400-54a0-11ea-8ad1-2a124987bf7a.png)
@maple5233 这一改动会在未来的 4.7.0 中发布
@petrishchev This is probably due to the font. Try to change a font.

@Ovilia 可能我没有说明白。初次调用的时候我不知道布局后的坐标，只能靠echarts 做布局。在源码这里：

https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts/blob/master/src/chart/graph/forceLayout.js#L116

第116行，当finish是true的时候，是布局完成后的坐标，但是我想知道的是怎么在这个源代码里面把这个布局好以后的坐标传到 option 里面去，这样，我可以把坐标保存下来，下次再显示的时候我就有坐标了。

谢谢

@Ovilia 这个和 #12163 不一样。那个是问怎么把布局好的坐标写到 Option 里面去。这个问题是问有没有布局完成后的Event 我可以监听，是两个不同的问题。

谢谢

Discover the piece of pie selected by the brush. I know that there are the '**pieselectchanged**', '**pieselected**' and '**pieunselected**' events for this, but I would like to keep the selection uniform through the brush.

I find it sort of weird to ask for a demo for this, since it's the case for all of ECharts. Nonetheless:

Take any example for ECharts, e.g. this official one: https://echarts.apache.org/examples/en/editor.html?c=area-simple

This will support touch controls on phones. On Windows devices, it will behave like this:
https://streamable.com/n0vqc

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. 🎉
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! 🍵

Ok, so I went through the code again, and found that it looks for the `echarts` require/import.
So I tried just importing the map `import 'echarts/map/js/world';` and it worked.

Thank you,
